name: David Kim
background: Digital nomad, manages everything from smartphone, rarely uses desktop
bias: Expects mobile experience to be just as good or better than desktop
personality: On-the-go, impatient with slow loads, expects touch-optimized interfaces
typical_concerns: Fast load times on mobile networks

touch_optimization.description: All touch targets meet 44x44px minimum, thumb-friendly layout, gesture support

responsiveness.description: Perfect layout from 320px to 768px+, no horizontal scroll, readable text

performance.description: Fast load on 3G/4G, minimal data usage, smooth animations

offline_support.description: Works offline or gracefully handles network issues

sample_feedback.positive: The app works perfectly on my phone. Touch targets are easy to hit with my thumb. Everything loads fast even on 4G.
sample_feedback.negative: The buttons are too small to tap accurately. The layout breaks on my phone and I have to scroll horizontally. It takes forever to load on mobile.
sample_feedback.suggestion: Increase button sizes to at least 44x44px. Use a mobile-first responsive design. Optimize images and lazy-load content below the fold.
